title: update PBE
body: when I update the PBE, the speed of update is 0kb/s

replies.body: This is usually caused by a connection issue that's preventing the patcher from downloading files.  Check out the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide that should help with this.  Let me know if you have any questions, and thanks for testing on the PBE!
